page.title: 04HOUSES IN PRESTATYN
page.content: In{Prestatyn}there is a variety of houses.Many new estates have been built in the 1980s.There are some attractive old buildings around the{ {High Street}area. The materials on the new houses are different from the old in lots of ways.They use bricks for the outside wall but for the inside of the houses they use big concrete blocks which help to keep the house insulated.Many of the new houses have double glazing which has aluminium or UPVC frames, again to keep the warmth in.In the older houses the window frames are made out of wood.The tiles on the roofs of the old houses are made out of slate but on the new houses the tiles are made out of clay or concrete. There are{council estates to the west of High St. but most houses are privately owned. { {
